name: Vikindor
description:
In one of the legends of antiquity, it was said that a certain Viking, having reached the magical dungeon, would be able to explore it completely, but no one believes in this, except for the Viking himself!

Vikindor - Side-Scroller Platformer, a game with random generation, where the player in each level gets into a randomly generated world of the underworld, with its enemies, unique locations, chests and other traps. Each race will be different from the next!

Game Features:
- Level Generation
-Pixel Art
- Atmosphere
